notes.content:
Staying productive's hard. Wicked hard. The constant flow of interruptions, both external and internal, our fear of missing out and addiction to dopamine we get from new and shiny things, makes getting shit done harder than ever. But all is not lost: below some of the most relevant aspects about productivity that have helped me avoid procrastination.
## focus 
to get things done, you need to have uninterrupted time 
## rhythm 
work in high intensity sprints of 90 minutes, then break for 15 minutes 
## rest 
without ample rest and sleep, your productivity will decline rapidly 
## tools 
use the best possible tools for your work 
## process 
increasing your productivity doesn't happen overnight
notes.title: updated notes on productivity
